item.title: Canary Black Cast & Character Guide
item.description: Canary Black's thrilling action and compelling drama are primarily driven by its well-written characters, portrayed by its talented cast members.

item.title: Boondock Saints Director Gleefully Admits He Ripped Off Quentin Tarantino For Willem Dafoe Scenes
item.description: Exclusive: The Boondock Saints director Troy Duffy gleefully admits that he ripped off Quentin Tarantino for the Willem Dafoe scenes.

item.title: Why Andrew Garfield Deleted His Facebook Account Before The Social Network
item.description: The Social Network star Andrew Garfield reveals why he deleted his Facebook account before filming the movie, and admits he had some unease about it.
